subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Wright has struggled to hit home runs at Citi Field the last two years, but he hit two more against the Diamondbacks, giving him four for the year and helping the Mets cruise to a win.
snippet: David Wright has struggled to hit home runs at Citi Field the last two years, but he hit two more against the Diamondbacks, giving him four for the year and helping the Mets cruise to a win.
